Title: Weiser
Writer: Wojciech Marczewski (scenario), Pawel Huelle (based on the novel by: "Weiser Dawidek"), Maciej Strzembosz (scenario collaborator), Tony Grisoni (scenario collaborator)
Actors: Marek Kondrat, Krystyna Janda, Juliane Köhler, Teresa Marczewska
Plot: he hero is Paul Heller, a man who in life was successful. For many years he lived in Hamburg, where he met his wife, and he made quite a pretty good property. After 11 years spent in exile, however, Paul decides to return to the Polish, the country, which since 1989 is the ideal place to start your own profitable business.
